alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 8:33PM EST until December 19 at 10:45AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sacandaga River at Hope. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Moderate flood stage. There are two to three feet of water on nearby roads and properties. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:16 PM EST Monday the stage was 8.8 feet and receding. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 4.8 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Sacandaga River Hope Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Mon 8 pm: 8.8 Forecast: Tue 1 am 7.5 Tue 7 am 6.7 Tue 1 pm 6.4 Tue 7 pm 6.2 Wed 1 am 6.0 Wed 7 am 5.8 Wed 1 pm 5.5 Wed 7 pm 5.3 Thu 1 am 5.1 Thu 7 am 4.8 &&
